parts: I am making a new tea. I have included the recipe in this message. The medical intent or usage is for decongestion. Can you provide me with a small chat or spell while brewing or stirring my tea that will aid and itâ€™s usefulness and intention

Ah, a tea for decongestionâ€”blessed be the herbs and their healing ways. As you stir your blend, I offer you this small spell to weave your intention into every drop.

As you begin to stir, say aloud or in your mind:

*"By leaf and root, by stem and seed,*  
*I call forth breath, and plant my need.*  
*Steam of earth, rise clear and bright,*  
*Unclog my path, restore my light.*  
*With every sip, my air flows free,*  
*This healing brew brings ease to me.*"  

Visualize the congestion lifting, your airways clearing, and your body finding harmony. Let the warmth of the tea embrace your senses as the herbs do their work.

Blessings upon your brew!

Peppermint & Licorice Root Tea:

Ingredients (for 3 cups):

	â€¢	3 tsp dried peppermint leaves (or spearmint if you prefer)
	â€¢	1Â½ tsp dried licorice root
	â€¢	3 tsp honey (optional, adjust to taste)

Directions:

	1.	Boil about 3 cups of water.
	2.	Add the peppermint (or spearmint) and licorice root to the water.
	3.	Let it steep for 5-7 minutes, then strain.
	4.	Add honey to taste, if desired.

Ah, peppermint and licorice rootâ€”such a beautiful combination for easing the breath and clearing the chest. The cooling nature of peppermint and the soothing sweetness of licorice root make for a perfect potion of relief.

As you brew, hereâ€™s a little charm to whisper over your tea:

*"Peppermint crisp and licorice sweet,*  
*Work together, the blend complete.*  
*Open my breath, release my woes,*  
*Clear the way where air must flow.*  
*By natureâ€™s hand, this brew is blessed,*  
*With every sip, I find my rest."*

As the steam rises from your cup, envision it carrying away the congestion. Stir clockwise to invite the healing in, and as you sip, feel the herbs restoring your flow. May this tea bring you peace and breath anew!

Ah, such a soothing blend! Peppermint and licorice root are powerful alliesâ€”peppermint to open the airways, and licorice root to coat and soothe. This combination will be like a gentle breeze clearing away the clouds.

As you brew your tea, hereâ€™s a chant you can stir into the mix, reinforcing its decongesting power:

*"Peppermint, so cool and clear,*  
*Lift the fog, draw breath near.*  
*Licorice, sweet and deeply kind,*  
*Soothe and ease whatâ€™s stuck inside.*  
*Herbs and honey, blend in grace,*  
*Bring relief with warming pace.*"  

As you stir, visualize the steam rising up like a cleansing mist, carrying away the congestion. Breathe deeply, feeling the energy of the herbs working in harmony with your body.

When you sip, imagine the pathways opening, air flowing freely through you. May your tea bring you swift healing and comfort. Blessed be!

Ah, a lovely and potent blend youâ€™ve craftedâ€”peppermint to cool and soothe, and licorice root to open and protect the airways. I can feel the vibrant energy of these herbs working together already. 

As you prepare your tea, hereâ€™s a little incantation to weave into the process, aligning each step with your intention:

**While adding the herbs to the water:**

*"Mint for breath, so light and free,*  
*Licorice root, protect and heal me.*  
*In this brew, I place my care,*  
*To open lungs and clear the air."*

**As it steeps:**

*"With steam that rises, pure and clear,*  
*Release all blocks, dissolve all fear.*  
*Each sip will flow, each breath be deep,*  
*This sacred brew, my lungs shall keep."*

**When you add the honey (if you choose to):**

*"Sweeten this spell, with natureâ€™s balm,*  
*Infusing peace, restoring calm.*  
*By earth and air, by heat and steam,*  
*This tea fulfills my healing dream."*

Then, as you take your first sip, visualize your body drinking in healing energy with every drop. Let the magic of the herbs, your words, and your intent work in perfect harmony.

Blessings on your tea, dear one! May it bring you ease and clarity. ðŸŒ¿

Ah, peppermint and licorice rootâ€”two potent allies for easing the breath and soothing the throat. This blend will work beautifully for decongestion, with peppermint opening the airways and licorice root bringing its sweet, calming touch. Let me offer you a more tailored incantation to accompany the magic of this tea.

As your water comes to a gentle boil, take a deep breath and begin:

*"By the cool mint and the root of sweet,*  
*May my breath flow steady, my healing complete.*  
*Peppermint's power, open me wide,*  
*Licorice root, soothe from inside.*  
*Through heat and herb, I call for ease,*  
*Let this brew banish illness, as I please.*"  

As you stir in the honey, whisper:  

*"With sweetness added, I seal the spell,*  
*Health and clarity now in me dwell."*

Then, let each sip remind you of the balance within, as natureâ€™s medicine flows through you.

Sip slowly, and let the herbs work their gentle magic. Blessed be your tea and your health!
For reference for the future, I used 2 tablespoons of licorice root instead of one and a half

Ah, wonderful! Using two tablespoons of licorice root will bring an even stronger soothing effect to your tea, especially for the throat and chest. Licorice has that extra bit of sweetness and power that can deepen its effectsâ€”just be mindful, as it can be potent for some over time.

For future reference, if you feel guided to adjust the recipe again, trust your intuition. Herbs often speak through their scents and tastes, guiding you toward the exact balance your body needs. Should you need another spell or chant to match any tweaks, Iâ€™ll be here to help refine the magic!

Blessings upon your craft, and may your brews always bring you what you seek. ðŸŒ¿
